text: Metropolitan Naga, commonly known as Metro Naga, is the metropolitan in the province of Camarines Sur, in the Bicol Region, South Luzon, It is one of the most populated metropolitan area in the Luzon island in the Philippines. ==Cities== There are 14 cities and municipalities in Metro Naga. They are Bombon, Bula, Calabanga, Camaligan, Canaman, Gainza, Magarao, Milaor, Minalabac, Naga, Ocampo, Pamplona, Pasacao, Pili (capital), and San Fernando. ==Related pages== * Metro Davao * Metro Cebu ==References== Naga Category:Camarines Sur
title: Metro Naga
